name: The minesweeper
description:
You have finished making your way throught the depths of the earth and reached the end of a mysterious cave.

Solving the game will brong glory and wealth but one mistake and that's over ! Mine all the squares without encounterring mines

All of Sound Design, Graphics and programming was made by me  (Basile Millereux)

 For a better sound experience put on headphones. 

 Input :

  • Mouse Button Left   = Take tool.
  • Mouse Button Right  = Drop Tool.
  • Escape = Quit.

Tips : 

  • Restart can be pressed without tool in hand.
  • Combo : Bucket -> x-Ray for cheating easily.

Engine : Love2D in LUA

Art asset : Photoshop

The minesweeper was made during a student project from school Creajeux. (2019-2020)
